markers.marker: Ribbon Girl states that her fingers don't stretch.
Ribbon Girl asks "How did I do?" when finished masturbating.
Ribbon Girl says that she hopes you weren't expecting her to leave her gloves on and fumble taking things off.
Ribbon Girl clarifies that she's not a super hero.
Ribbon Girl clarifies that she's not trying to hide her identity.
Ribbon Girl mentions how her arms give her a "nude with gloves" look.
Ribbon Girl pretends to be surprised by her own hands, poking fun at a common misconception about ARMS fighters.
